keyMoments.title: G-5 Marines' Farewell to the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: The G-5 Marines bid a complicated farewell to the Straw Hats, insulting them publicly while privately respecting their heroism.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the complex relationship between the Straw Hats and the Marines they worked alongside.

keyMoments.title: Children's Emotional Goodbye
keyMoments.description: The rescued children tearfully say goodbye to the Straw Hats, with many declaring they want to become pirates like them.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the lasting positive impact the Straw Hats have on people they help.

keyMoments.title: Alliance Departs Punk Hazard
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates officially depart Punk Hazard with the Heart Pirates as allies.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of their joint journey to challenge Kaido.

keyMoments.title: Law's Ultimatum to Doflamingo
keyMoments.description: Law, captain of the Heart Pirates, delivers an ultimatum to Doflamingo that sets the Dressrosa Arc in motion.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Law's strategic leadership and his plan to take down Doflamingo and Kaido.

keyMoments.title: Alliance Departs Punk Hazard
keyMoments.description: The Heart Pirates depart Punk Hazard alongside the Straw Hat Pirates as official allies.
keyMoments.significance: Solidifies the alliance between the two crews against the Yonko Kaido.

keyMoments.title: G-5 Marines' Conflicted Farewell
keyMoments.description: The G-5 Marines insult the Straw Hats while blocking the children's view, later revealing they did so to prevent the children from developing attachments to pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the moral complexity in One Piece and shows that Marines and pirates aren't simply good vs evil.
